title: Perspective - Ep 80
itunes:title: Perspective - Ep 80
description:
In this mini-podcast, Vitaliy shares a personal story that illustrates how profound even a tiny shift in perspective can be.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/perspective/
